name: Marvel Horse, fantasy equine sim
blurb: Create and care for your own fantasy horses in our browser-based game! Design and register your own breeds, and so much more!

rewards.reward: No Reward

PRE-REGISTRY: Receive early access to Marvel Horse 5 days before our grand opening, and get a head start! You will also unlock a "Sponsor" achievement, which gives you exclusive perks. Thanks for the support, guys!
HEAVENLY: This donation level includes to incentives of the "Pre-Registry" level, and also an exclusive pack (5) of the "heavenly" battle items! These items will only be available in the Cash Shop!
BONUS BACKER: This package will include a pack of 10 items, 50,000 Marvel Coins, a pre-register account, and 5 Marvel Cash!

POWER PLAYER: This donation level includes to incentives of the "Heavenly" pack, as well as 50,000 player points! This will give you the ability to unlock five additional breeds to the three you will already have access to!

WICKED: Supporters at this level will receive the perks of the "Power Player" donation level, and also receive our Wicked item collection! This collection includes one potion, two battle items, and two collectables! These items are also exclusive to the Cash Shop!
RESTORATION: This level includes all of the perks of "Pre-Registry", with the ability to restore your old account! Player Points, Marvel Cash, 40% of Marvel Coins will be restored.

SECOND CHANCE: This level of donation includes all of the perks of the "Pre-Registry" donation level, and the ability to restore (3) horses from your previous account! Additionally, their age will be reset to three!
ELITE: This level of donation includes perks from the "Wicked" package, plus one basic breed creation coin. This coin will allow you to create your own breed!

PLATINUM: This level contains the perks of the "Elite" package, plus a six month upgraded account. Upgraded accounts gives exclusive access to additional parts of the game! This level also will be given a low digit account (70-100) in the order of donations!
SUPER PREMIUM: This Level Contains all the perks from previous packages, plus a forever upgraded account. You will also receive two upgraded breed creation coins!

TINKER: This level includes all items from the "Super Premium" pack, plus an additional item pack (5 items) that you get to create and design! From theme to item function, you call the shots! You will also be credited on the item information page!
OLD TIMER: This level includes all perks of the "Super Premium" packaged, plus a single digit account. Accounts 3-9 will be given away in order of the donation!

EXTRA-OLD TIMER: This level includes all perks of the "Super Premium" packaged, plus a two digit account. Accounts 10-30 will be given away in order of the donation! Plus, this donor level will get two extra barns!
ITEM HOARDER: This level includes all perks from the "Super Premium" package, plus 30 additional random items. You will also receive two extra barns!

MASTER CREATOR: This level includes all perks from the "Super Premium" package, plus your own specifically designed breed. This breed will include a new base, and all new genetic features! You will also be credited in the Breed registry, and receive four of your newly created horses!

ULTIMATE CREATOR: This level includes all of the perks from the "Master Creator" level, plus the ability to design three wearable items for your breed. These items can be anything from armor to tack! Please see details to your left for limitations! You will also be credited in the Breed registry, and receive four of your newly created horses!

APPAREL CREATOR: This level includes all of the perks of the "Super Premium" package, plus the ability to design three wearables, which can be worn by all current and future Marvel Horse Breeds. You will also be credited on the Item Information pages, and receive two sets of these items.
ULTIMATE SPONSOR: This level includes all perks from our previous packages. You will also have an Ultimate Sponsor level account, which automatically unlocks all breeds! We give you many thanks!

MARVEL: This level includes all perks from our Ultimate Sponsor level package. However, this donor will also receive Marvel Horse Breed calendar, and sticker collection. This sponsor will also be recognized on our "About Us" page as a key player in our development. Lastly, this player will have the ability to select the next two new breed bases to be implemented into the game, and be credited. Thank you for donating!
